thread.section_title: Regina Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Birthday gift for my daughter's 18th birthday
thread.title_full: Birthday gift for my daughter's 18th birthday - Review of Regina Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: carmelfer
title: Birthday gift for my daughter's 18th birthday
text:
I just returned from a magical trip to Paris with my daughter and niece to celebrate their 18th and 20th birthday's. The Hotel Regina was a wonderful! The beautiful building was located directly across the street from Le Louvre and walking distance to shops and restaurants.
The service was excellent, staff friendly, cheerful and courteous.
We stayed in the family room which essentially was two connecting rooms. The beds comfortable and decor lovely.
I would highly recommend the hotel Regina to anyone traveling to Paris
